title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http://contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

title: Gene annotation sources
text: provide tissue- cell-type specific gene expression annotations Human Protein Atlas. Tissue-specific patterns derived Tissue Atlas, tissue specificity derived deep sequencing RNA (RNA-seq) 37 different normal tissue types. putative protein -coding genes classified respect abundance (tissue enriched, tissue enhanced etc.) different tissues. cell type specificity, utilize data Cell Type Atlas. , classification protein-coding genes based single cell type-specific expression 13 different human tissues performed; determining types genes elevated (cell type enriched, cell type enhanced etc.) particular cell type compared cell types.

title: Gene annotation sources
text: Subcellular locationalization annotations retrieved ComPPI. Users possibility set threshold respect confidence (number underlying sources, 1-6) target-localization annotation.

title: Gene annotation sources
text: Protein-protein interactions retrieved STRING resource, utilizing publicly available API network retrieval. oncoEnrichR, users provide required (minimum) interaction score threshold, limiting interactions retrieved interaction score greater equal threshold.

title: Gene annotation sources
text: Regulatory interactions (TF-target) retrieved DoRothEA resource. Two collections interactions subject overlap queryset oncoEnrichR: global set regulatory interactions, many inferred gene expression patterns normal tissues (GTex), cancer-focused set, latter inferred gene expression patterns tumors (TCGA).

title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: oncoEnrichR R package functional interrogation human genesets context cancer. package leverages extensive amount prior molecular knowledge geneset interpretation along multiple dimensions. Web-based access oncoEnrichR available https://oncotools.elixir.oncoEnrichR primarily intended exploratory analysis prioritization gene list (referred query set) high-throughput cancer biology experiments, e.g.Â genetic screens (siRNA/CRISPR), protein proximity labeling, transcriptomics (differential expression). tool queries number high-quality data resources order assemble useful gene annotations analyses interactive report (examples report shown ).    contents final report attempt provide answers following questions: diseases/tumor types known associated genes query set, extent? genes query set attributed cancer hallmark evidence? proteins query sets druggable diffferent cancer conditions (early late clinical development phases)? proteins query set, likelihood druggable? protein complexes involve proteins query set? subcellular compartments (nucleus, cytosol, plasma membrane etc) dominant localizations proteins query set? specific tissues cell types enriched query set, considering tissue/cell-type specific expression patterns target genes? protein-protein interactions known within query set? interactions members query set cancer-relevant proteins (e.g.Â proto-oncogenes, tumor-suppressors predicted cancer drivers)? proteins constitute hubs protein-protein interaction network? known regulatory interactions (TF-target) found within query set, mode regulation (repressive vs.Â stimulating)? occurrences known ligand-receptor interactions within query set? specific pathways, biological processes, pre-defined molecular signatures enriched within query set, compared reference/background set? members query set frequently mutated tumor sample cohorts (TCGA, SNVs/InDels, homozygous deletions, copy number amplifications)? members query set co-expressed (strong negative positive correlations) cancer-relevant genes (.e.Â proto-oncogenes tumor suppressors) tumor sample cohorts (TCGA)? members query set associated better/worse survival different cancers, considering high low gene expression levels, mutation, copy number status tumors? members query set associated cellular loss--fitness CRISPR/Cas9 whole-genome drop screens cancer cell lines (.e.Â reduction cell viability elicited gene inactivation)? targets prioritized therapeutic targets, considering fitness effects genomic biomarkers combination?

title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: October 27th 2021: 1.0.6 release Addition new modules Regulatory interactions - DoRothEA Ligand-receptor interactions - CellChatDB Data updates: Open Targets Platform, KEGG, WikiPathways, CancerMine, TCGA, EFO, DiseaseOntology Additional dedicated enrichment plots (GO) Improved target rankings (tissue- celltype enrichment, regulatory interactions) See complete CHANGELOG July 8th 2021: 1.0.4 release Fixed bug v1.0.3 - HTML report generation failed June 29th 2021: 1.0.3 release Minor typo fixes HTML output Data upgrade: KEGG, WikiPathways, CancerMine NEW: web interface oncoEnrichR: oncotools.elixir.June 8th 2021: 1.0.0 release Added methylation prognostic feature Smith et al., bioRxiv, 2021 keep size output Excel/HTML files managable levels, maximum size queryset reduced n = 600 genes Fixed assymetrical scales prognostic Z-score plots

title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: Data harvested following resources form backbone oncoEnrichR: Open Targets Platform - human drug-target associations comprehensive disease-target associations CancerMine - literature-mined database drivers, oncogenes tumor suppressors cancer DoRothEA - gene set resource containing signed transcription factor (TF) - target (regulatory) interactions CellChatDB - ligand-receptor interaction resource Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) - gene aberration frequencies co-expression patterns ~9,500 primary tumor samples Human Protein Atlas - expression data healthy human tissues (GTex)/cell types, prognostic gene expression associations cancer Molecular Signatures Database (MSigDB) - collection annotated (e.g.Â towards pathways) genesets enrichment/overrepresentation analysis. includes genesets Gene Ontology, Reactome, KEGG, WikiPathways, BIOCARTA, well curated immunologic cancer-specific signatures. NetPath - signaling transduction pathways STRING - protein-protein interaction database CORUM - protein complex database Compleat - protein complex resource ComplexPortal - manually curated, encyclopaedic resource macromolecular complexes hu.MAP2 - human protein complex map ComPPI - subcellular compartment database Project Score - Database effects cancer cell line viability elicited CRISPR-Cas9 mediated gene activation Genetic determinants survival cancer - Resource relative prognostic impact gene mutation, expression, methylation, CNA human cancers

previous_headings: oncoEnrichR - cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation > Getting started
title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: install.packages('devtools') devtools::install_github('sigven/oncoEnrichR') library(oncoEnrichR)

previous_headings: oncoEnrichR - cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation > Getting started
title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: oncoEnrichR performs operations following procedures/methods: 1. oncoEnrichR::onco_enrich() Consists two main processing steps: 1) Takes input/query list human gene/protein identifiers (e.g.Â UniProt accession, RefSeq/Ensembl transcript identifer etc.) input conducts uniform identifier conversion 2) Performs extensive annotation, enrichment membership analyses query set underlying data sources cancer-relevant properties human genes interrelationships. Technically, method returns list object contents analyses performed. specific arguments/options default values outlined : See detailed descriptions options 2. oncoEnrichR::write() Consists two main processing steps: 1) Transform contents analyses returned oncoEnrichR::onco_enrich() various visualizations interactive tables 2) Assemble write final analysis report ) structured interactive oncoEnrichR HTML report, B) multisheet Excel workbook results annotations analyses provided oncoEnrichR
code: onco_enrich(   query,   query_id_type = "symbol",   ignore_id_err = TRUE,   html_floating_toc = TRUE,   html_report_theme = "default",   project_title = "Project title",   project_owner = "Project owner",   project_description = "Project description",   bgset = NULL,   bgset_id_type = "symbol",   bgset_description = "All protein-coding genes",   p_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.05,   p_value_adjustment_method = "BH",   q_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.2,   min_geneset_size = 10,   max_geneset_size = 500,   num_terms_enrichment_plot = 20,   min_subcellcomp_confidence = 1,   subcellcomp_show_cytosol = FALSE,   min_confidence_reg_interaction = "D",   simplify_go = F,   show_ppi = T,   show_drugs_in_ppi = T,   show_disease = T,   show_top_diseases_only = T,   show_cancer_hallmarks = T,   show_drug = T,   show_enrichment = T,   show_tcga_aberration = T,   show_tcga_coexpression = T,   show_subcell_comp = T,   show_crispr_lof = T,   show_cell_tissue = F,   show_ligand_receptor = T,   show_regulatory_interactions = T,   show_unknown_function = T,   show_prognostic_cancer_assoc = T,   show_complex = T)

previous_headings: oncoEnrichR - cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation > Getting started
title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: target list n = 134 high-confidence interacting proteins c-MYC oncoprotein previously identified BioID protein proximity assay standard cell culture tumor xenografts (Dingar et al., J Proteomics, 2015). ran target list oncoEnrichR analysis workflow using following configurations onco_enrich method: project_title = "cMYC_BioID_screen" project_owner = "Raught et al." produced following HTML report results. R commands provided reproduce example output. NOTE: Replace âLOCAL_FOLDERâ directory local computer: library(oncoEnrichR) myc_interact_targets <- read.csv(system.file("extdata","myc_data.csv", package = "oncoEnrichR"), stringsAsFactors = F) myc_report <- oncoEnrichR::onco_enrich(query = myc_interact_targets$symbol, show_cell_tissue = T, project_title = "cMYC_BioID_screen", project_owner = "Raught et al.") oncoEnrichR::write(report = myc_report, file = "LOCAL_FOLDER/myc_report_oncoenrichr.html", format = "html") oncoEnrichR::write(report = myc_report, file = "LOCAL_FOLDER/myc_report_oncoenrichr.xlsx", format = "excel")

title: Interrogate a gene list for cancer relevance â onco_enrich
code: onco_enrich(   query,   query_id_type = "symbol",   ignore_id_err = TRUE,   html_floating_toc = T,   html_report_theme = "default",   project_title = "Project title",   project_owner = "Project owner",   project_description = "Project description",   bgset = NULL,   bgset_id_type = "symbol",   bgset_description = "All protein-coding genes",   p_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.05,   p_value_adjustment_method = "BH",   q_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.2,   min_geneset_size = 10,   max_geneset_size = 500,   num_terms_enrichment_plot = 20,   min_subcellcomp_confidence = 1,   subcellcomp_show_cytosol = FALSE,   min_confidence_reg_interaction = "D",   simplify_go = TRUE,   ppi_add_nodes = 50,   ppi_score_threshold = 900,   show_ppi = TRUE,   show_drugs_in_ppi = TRUE,   show_disease = TRUE,   show_top_diseases_only = TRUE,   show_cancer_hallmarks = TRUE,   show_drug = TRUE,   show_enrichment = TRUE,   show_tcga_aberration = TRUE,   show_tcga_coexpression = TRUE,   show_cell_tissue = FALSE,   show_ligand_receptor = TRUE,   show_regulatory_interactions = TRUE,   show_unknown_function = TRUE,   show_prognostic_cancer_assoc = TRUE,   show_subcell_comp = TRUE,   show_crispr_lof = TRUE,   show_complex = TRUE,   ... )

title: Interrogate a gene list for cancer relevance â onco_enrich
text: query character vector gene/query identifiers query_id_type character indicating source query (one "uniprot_acc", "symbol", "entrezgene", "ensembl_gene","ensembl_mrna","refseq_mrna","ensembl_protein","refseq_protein") ignore_id_err logical indicating analysis continue uknown query identifiers encountered html_floating_toc logical - float table contents left main document content (HTML report). floating table contents always visible even document scrolled html_report_theme Bootswatch theme HTML report ("bootstrap","cerulean","cosmo","default","flatly","journal","lumen","paper","sandstone","simplex","spacelab","united","yeti") project_title project title (title report) project_owner name project owner project_description project background information bgset character vector gene identifiers, used reference/background enrichment/-representation analysis bgset_id_type character indicating source background ("uniprot_acc","symbol","entrezgene","ensembl_gene_id") bgset_description character indicating type background (e.g. "lipid-binding proteins (n = 200)") p_value_cutoff_enrichment cutoff p-value enrichment/-representation analysis p_value_adjustment_method one "holm", "hochberg", "hommel", "bonferroni", "BH", "", "fdr", "none" q_value_cutoff_enrichment cutoff q-value enrichment analysis min_geneset_size minimal size geneset annotated term testing enrichment/-representation analysis max_geneset_size maximal size geneset annotated term testing enrichment/-representation analysis num_terms_enrichment_plot number top enriched Gene Ontology terms (max) show enrichment barplot min_subcellcomp_confidence minimum confidence level subcellular compartment annotations (range 1 6, 6 strongest) subcellcomp_show_cytosol logical indicating subcellular heatmap show highlight proteins located cytosol min_confidence_reg_interaction minimum confidence level regulatory interactions (TF-target) retrieved DoRothEA ('','B','C', 'D') simplify_go remove highly similar GO terms results GO enrichment/-representation analysis ppi_add_nodes number nodes add target set computing protein-protein interaction network (STRING) ppi_score_threshold minimum score (0-1000) retrieval protein-protein interactions (STRING) show_ppi logical indicating report contain protein-protein interaction data (STRING) show_drugs_in_ppi logical indicating targeted drugs (> phase 3) displayed protein-protein interaction network (Open Targets Platform) show_disease logical indicating report contain disease associations (Open Targets Platform, association_score >= 0.05, support least two data types) show_top_diseases_only logical indicating report contain top (n = 20) disease associations pr. query gene (Open Targets Platform) show_cancer_hallmarks logical indicating report contain annotations/evidence cancer hallmarks per query gene (COSMIC/Open Targets Platform) show_enrichment logical indicating report contain functional enrichment/-representation analysis (MSigDB, GO, KEGG, REACTOME, NetPath, WikiPathways) show_tcga_aberration logical indicating report contain TCGA aberration plots (amplifications/deletions) show_tcga_coexpression logical indicating report contain TCGA co-expression data (RNAseq) query set oncogenes/tumor suppressor genes show_cell_tissue logical indicating report contain tissue-specificity single cell-type specificity assessments (Human Protein Atlas) target genes, using data Human Protein Atlas show_ligand_receptor logical indicating report contain ligand-receptor interactions (CellChatDB) show_regulatory_interactions logical indicating report contain data transcription factor (TF) - target interactions relevant query set (DoRothEA) show_unknown_function logical indicating report highlight target genes unknown poorly defined functions (GO/Uniprot KB/NCBI) show_prognostic_cancer_assoc logical indicating mRNA-based (single-gene) prognostic associations cancer types listed (Human Protein Atlas/TCGA) show_subcell_comp logical indicating report provide subcellular compartment annotations (ComPPI) show_crispr_lof logical indicating report provide fitness scores target priority scores CRISPR/Cas9 loss--fitness screens (Project Score) show_complex logical indicating report provide target memberships known protein complexes (ComplexPortal/Compleat/PDB/CORUM)

what: Function that writes an oncoEnrichR report object to file â write

text: Function writes oncoEnrichR report object file

title: Function that writes an oncoEnrichR report object to file â write
code: write(   report,   file = "testReport.html",   ignore_file_extension = F,   overwrite = F,   format = "html",   ... )

title: Function that writes an oncoEnrichR report object to file â write
text: report object oncoEnrichR report data (returned oncoEnrichR::onco_enrich) file full filename report output (e.g. "oe_report.html", "oe_report.xlsx") ignore_file_extension logical accept type filaname extensions (Galaxy integration) overwrite logical indicating existing output files may overwritten format file format output (html/excel) ... options Galaxy/non self-contained HTML. applicable use Galaxy

title: Version 1.0.6
text: KEGG (20211013) WikiPathways (20211010) Open Targets Platform (2021.09) EFO (v3.35.0), DiseaseOntology (v2021-10-11) TCGA (v30, 2021-09-23) Protein complex annotations - additions Compleat, ComplexPortal, PDB, hu.MAP2 View overlap members queryset previously established regulatory interactions (TF-target relationships) DoRothEA resource Explore potential ligand-receptor interactions query set, found CellChat database Choose Bootswatch theme HTML report - option html_report_theme Choose table contents placed HTML report (floating-left static top) - option html_floating_toc html_floating_toc - logical, set FALSE, table contents HTML report placed top main document html_report_theme - character, choose different Bootswatch themes style HTML report show_regulatory - logical, show regulatory interactions module (DoRothEA) min_confidence_reg_interaction - character, minimum confidence regulatory interactions included DoRothEA (ââ,âBâ,âCâ, âDâ) show_ligand_receptor - logical, show ligand-receptor interaction module (CellChatDB) num_terms_enrichment_plot - integer, number enriched Gene Ontology terms (max) show enrichment barplots (module Functional Enrichment) modules Regulatory Interactions Tissue cell type enrichment, interactions/targets ranked according quantitative cancer association score cancer_max_rank (maximum gene-cancer association rank (Open Targets Platform) across primary sites)
